values:
Everyone seems to know that about every few years or so I tend to start a new journal. Why I do this I have no clue, probably because I tend to trust fewer and fewer people as the years go on and I like to hide in layers uppon layers of internet trash, or because I just get bored witht he old ones. It's probably a mix of the two. 

but yeah, ya'll know the drill. friends only, I'm creepy about who reads this stuff even if it's totally boring and all I talk about is my beard and my dog.
